channel.title: The Forums
channel.description:
Why are the forums getting worse and worse each day? Wales 00 apparently diagnosed with lung cancer, the god of ikkiliki whatever his name is thing was leaked, we've had over 3 deaths, and more. And servers are becoming worse and worse each day.
Does anyone think anything will get better? :(

item.title: The Forums
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

And then to add to the horrors, we come across some wierd guy called pk3r john who denies he is called john but still puts john in his name and claims not to be john in johns sig!

Read full topic

item.title: The Forums
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Because behind the screen name is a real person…

And don’t compare a bad server to the death of a person…

Read full topic
